server.name: Gotas Commerce Payment Integration
server.description: Enable AI assistants to create and verify cryptocurrency payments using USDT through the Gotas Commerce API. Seamlessly generate payment links and check payment statuses via an MCP server compatible with Claude and other assistants. Simplify cryptocurrency payment workflows with direct API and MCP tool access.

tools.name: create-payment
tools.description: Creates a new payment in the Gotas Commerce API and returns payment details including URL for customer payment.

currency.description: Currency code, currently only USDT is supported

return_url.description: URL to redirect customer after payment completion

description.description: Optional description or reference for the payment

status.description: Current payment status (pending, completed, failed, expired)

payment_url.description: URL to redirect customers to complete payment

wallet_address.description: Destination wallet address for the payment

expires_at.description: ISO timestamp when the payment expires

created_at.description: ISO timestamp when the payment was created

description.description: Description of what is being paid for

tools.name: check-payment-status
tools.description: Checks the status of an existing payment by ID

payment_id.description: The ID of the payment to check

status.description: Current payment status (pending, completed, failed, expired)

payment_url.description: URL to redirect customers to complete payment

wallet_address.description: Destination wallet address for the payment

tx_hash.description: Transaction hash for completed payments (null if pending)

expires_at.description: ISO timestamp when the payment expires

created_at.description: ISO timestamp when the payment was created

completed_at.description: ISO timestamp when the payment was completed (null if pending)

description.description: Description of what is being paid for

base_url.description: Base URL for the Gotas Commerce API
